cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Private room. Standard double room with 1x double bed.
Full linen and towels provided.
Shared bathroom with 4 showers and 4 toilets in the hostel.
Free on-street parking for cars.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Superior 4 Bed Family Room Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Private room with 1 queen bed and 1x bunk style bed, with great ocean views. Full linen and towels provided. 
Shared bathroom, with 4 showers and 4 separate toilets in the hostel.
2 rooms of this type. 1x upstairs & 1x downstairs.
Free on-street parkin

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

specialEventConditions.title: Public Holidays/Special Events
specialEventConditions.description:
Public Holidays/Special Events
- For bookings over public holidays and special events, 1 months notice is required prior to the date of arrival to avoid the cancellation fee.  This includes New Years Eve, New Years Day (Dec 31 / Jan 1), Waitangi Day (Feb 6), Rugby Sevens Weekend.
- The cancellation fee is equal to one night's accommodation and will be charged to the credit card details provided at the time of booking.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 16th Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 16th Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
